languages.text: {n}Ответ сержанта не слишком полезен. Когда опасность повсюду и имеет много форм, подготовиться к ней невозможно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сложно точно предугадать, что именно вас ожидает, но ясно, что путь будет нелегким.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you in many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ответ сержанта не слишком полезен. Когда опасность повсюду и имеет много форм, подготовиться к ней невозможно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you and has many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}
{n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you and has many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}
{n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you in many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}
{n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you in many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}
{n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you in many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}
{n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you in many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Antwort des Sergeants ist nicht sonderlich hilfreich. Wenn man von Gefahr in verschiedenster Ausprägung umgeben ist, ist es unmöglich, sich dagegen zu wappnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you in many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Antwort des Sergeants ist nicht sonderlich hilfreich. Wenn man von Gefahr in verschiedenster Ausprägung umgeben ist, ist es unmöglich, sich dagegen zu wappnen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La réponse du sergent ne vous aide pas particulièrement. Quand le danger est partout et qu'il revêt bien des formes, il est impossible de s'y préparer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you in many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La réponse du sergent ne vous aide pas particulièrement. Quand le danger est partout et qu'il revêt bien des formes, il est impossible de s'y préparer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}军士的回答不是很有帮助。如果一片区域到处都是危险的东西，那你恐怕没办法做出什么有效的预防措施。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you in many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}军士的回答不是很有帮助。如果一片区域到处都是危险的东西，那你恐怕没办法做出什么有效的预防措施。{/n}

languages.text: {n}軍曹の回答は、あまり役に立たない。危険がさまざまな形で身の回りにあるとき、それに備えることは不可能だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you in many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}軍曹の回答は、あまり役に立たない。危険がさまざまな形で身の回りにあるとき、それに備えることは不可能だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La respuesta del sargento no es especialmente útil. Cuando el peligro te rodea de muchas formas, es imposible prepararse para él.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you in many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La respuesta del sargento no es especialmente útil. Cuando el peligro te rodea de muchas formas, es imposible prepararse para él.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çavuşun cevabı pek yardımcı olmuyor. Tehlike etrafını sarıp türlü türlü biçimlere bürünmüşken hazırlıklı olmak imkânsız.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant's answer is not particularly helpful. When danger is all around you in many forms, it is impossible to prepare for it.{/n}
